participant_2.background:
I enjoyed a week at the beach, swimming, sunbathing, and reading.
My rock collection is my favorite thing in the world.
i used to own several casinos.
i like rollerblading.
i have a rose tattooed on my right ankle.

content.text: It's going great! I'm just about to go rollerblading, it's a beautiful day outside.
Oh that's fun! I've always wanted to learn how to rollerblade.
It's pretty easy to learn, just takes some practice. What are your hobbies?
I enjoy hanging out with friends and family, and I love to cook. I can speak 3 languages: Arabic, English, and French.
That's awesome! I can speak English and some Spanish. I used to own several casinos, but I've since retired.
Wow, that's amazing! What was it like owning several casinos?
It was a lot of fun, but it was also a lot of work. I'm glad I retired, but I miss it sometimes.
I can imagine it was a lot of work! I'm glad you're enjoying your retirement.
What are you looking forward to doing today?
I'm looking forward to rollerblading and then relaxing at home with a good book.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day!
It does! I hope you have a great day too.
